name: Mal * War
description:
Intermediate Game Dev student project from Charles Yu, Kenrick Tse, and Justin Ha.

Mal*War tasks two players with surviving as long as they can against the endless horde of viruses that infects their system. The player on the Keyboard shoots using ammo they get from the dropping blocks. The player on the Mouse keeps the blocks dropping using materials they gain when the keyboard player slays enemies. You'll need to work together to decide when to place barricades, ammo, and health to get as high a score as possible. But watch out - the longer you go, the more enemies arrive, and some may gain special new abilities...
